name: SNTimeDurationConstraint
desc: Defines the time duration windows the requestâ€™s underlying sound classifier accepts with a range, or an array, of durations.

items.name: case durationRange(CMTimeRange)

items.name: case enumeratedDurations([CMTime])
items.desc: A constraint that defines acceptable time window durations in a discrete list.
